name: Meteor Dodger (Chazzwazzler)
description:
Meteor Dodger is simple arcade like game I made for a school project in a short amount of time.

In it, you dodge meteors and try to get a highscore for the amount of time you have lived. You have 3 lives and the game speed increases exponentially faster.

Controls:

W/S or up arrow /down arrow - Move up or down
Space - Shoot
R - Restart
